lead_paragraph: Former U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton is urging Congress to resist imposing new sanctions on Iran over its nuclear program, saying that "this is the time" to give diplomacy a chance to work.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Argues Against Additional Sanctions on Iran
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton Argues Against Additional Sanctions on Iran

snippet: Former U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton is urging Congress to resist imposing new sanctions on Iran over its nuclear program, saying that "this is the time" to give diplomacy a chance to work....
